remarks: The topological indistinguishability map is a closed map.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)
statement:
kqval.2 $e |- F = ( x e. X |-> { y e. J | x e. y } ) $.
kqcld $p |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ U e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) -> ( F " U ) e. ( Clsd ` ( KQ ` J ) ) ) $.
$d J x y $.
$d X x y $.
